document.full_text: iran's parliament said on wednesday president mahmoud ahmadinejad acted illegally by declaring himself caretaker oil minister and referred the case to the judiciary, increasing pressure on him to quit the post.
document.title: iran parliament: ahmadinejad ministry move illegal
lines_and_colors: iran's parliament said on wednesday president mahmoud ahmadinejad acted illegally by declaring himself caretaker oil minister and referred the case to the judiciary, increasing pressure on him to quit the post.
